name: Brad Hill
text: This place has vastly improved over when it was first opened. I went on a dinner date recently and we were both so pleased that we have been back since. The service was good and the general vibe of the place is comfortable and eye catching. I do recommend for sure.

text:
Great place to eat. Pizza was delicious. Waitress was excellent
Very clean place. Loved it.

name: Jahzara clark
text: Pizza was good but the garlic butter must have been bad. 6 of ate the exact same pizza but I was the only one who ate the garlic butter and now I am sick as a dog.

text:
I'm from Chicago, so I'm very picky about my pizza. but this was very good! I would definitely eat there again.
The triple mushroom is excellent

name: kasey lee
text: We ordered mellow mushroom during quarantine, and they did a 100% contactless pick up, left us a very kind note, and even added complementary brownies. We have never had bad service before this, but this was spectacular.

name: Randy McNamara
text: We live around Chicago and have some of the best pizza in the world but I can honestly say this was some of the best pizza I have ever had. By far the best tasting crust and all of the ingredients had great flavor. Well done! We had The ‚Ä¶More

name: Steven Combs
text: Upscale chain pizza restaurant with some of our favorite pizzas: the White Pizza is at the top of the list. Staff was amazing during our COVID takeout. Provided plates, plastic wear, napkins and verified order. Great Kentucky hospitality.

name: Will P
text: Everything was delicious. Our waiter was awesome. Definitely a great place to eat. Food was hot when they brought it out :) A++

name: Edward Pistilli
text: This place is perfect. So glad  we found it. I understand it is a chain. There are two near where we are from in Florida   Told my Son. He is taking the family as he saw but never tried   Good food and service.

name: brad reinhart
text: Absolutely amazing wings! The jerk really surprised me, i love them. The pizza was also, of course, great. They were busy and the carryout guy was overwhelmed, he needed more support for sure but they were doing what they could do.

text: I love the pizza and the service I received. Very nice and prompt.

text: Get place to eat. Has great pizza and great service. Very friendly staff.

name: Martin Johnson
text: I love this place. The pizza is amazing. When I lived in Somerset I often went and bought a couple larges and just ate them through the week. Now it's just a treat when I'm in the area. The tomato bisque soup is the best I've ever had. Friendly and welcoming environment.

name: Kathleen Walls

name: Adrian Clark
text: Amazing pizza and calzones. This place never disappoints.

name: Nick Overbey
text: Staff are always super friendly and the restaurant is very clean. The pizza just isn't my taste. It's basically eating a loaf of bread with a little tomato sauce and toppings. The balance of dough vs everything else is way WAY off. If you like dough then this is the place for you. If you like pizza, there are better pies in the area.

name: Sherrie Burns
text: Great staff. Friendly,very clean, great atmosphere. One of the few places I've been on that's doing inside dining right thru covid 19. I would highly recommend these guys

name: Stephanie FitzSimon
text: Somerset is moving on up with the level of this quality of food, rock on Mellow Mushroom. ü§òüíö I've always enjoyed myself and my company when I come to dine here, the food is top notch and on point. The options they offer are incredible.

name: Alex Langley
text: Food and service was excellent. When I asked the server for a recommendation he gave his opinion, which is something I really appreciate when I've only been to a place once before. They were a little slow, but the restaurant was packed, so it wasn't their fault.

name: joseph becher
text: It's a little expensive and the food doesn't come very quickly, but everything I've tried from here has been pretty tasty. Considerate staff as far as I can tell. If you haven't been, give it a shot.
